title: age-of-aincrad.com Launched!
description: The new website of Age of Aincrad finally launched.

title: Developing extended-nmea
description: These are some insights into the development of a node package called extended-nmea, which decodes a stream of text from a protocol called NMEA0183 into objects. Written in TypeScript.

title: It's rocket science
description: It's simply rocket science, can't be that hard, _right_?

title: Progress update for age-of-aincrad.com
description: This is a progress update on my work for the new homepage for age-of-aincrad.com.

title: Currently working on age-of-aincrad.com
description: I am currently working on the new homepage for age-of-aincrad.com (an MMOARPG inspired by Sword Art Online). This is the current state.

title: No new content for a long time
description: I haven't taken advantage of my new blog system yet. These are some topics I find interesting and will maybe write something about in the future.

title: About Developer-Focused PC Builds
description: I recently saw a video on LinusTechTips where he rebuilt Linus Torvalds PC. He said they didn't do developer-focused PC building guides, because they don't know the requirements. I wanted to write something about what hardware is needed by software developers.

title: New Website!
description: I finally developed a new personal website. In this post, I documented the road to my new website using Nuxt.js and GitHub Pages.
